nodes.Description:
CWE-624: Executable Regular Expression Error
The product uses a regular expression that either (1) contains an executable component with user-controlled inputs, or (2) allows a user to enable execution by inserting pattern modifiers.
nodes.label: Executable Regular Expression Error

nodes.Description:
CWE-88: Improper Neutralization of Argument Delimiters in a Command ('Argument Injection')
The product constructs a string for a command to be executed by a separate component in another control sphere, but it does not properly delimit the intended arguments, options, or switches within that command string.
nodes.label: Improper Neutralization of Argument Delimiters in a Command ('Argument Injection')

nodes.Description:
CWE-917: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an Expression Language Statement ('Expression Language Injection')
The product constructs all or part of an expression language (EL) statement in a framework such as a Java Server Page (JSP) using externally-influenced input from an upstream component, but it does not neutralize or incorrectly neutralizes special elements that could modify the intended EL statement before it is executed.
nodes.label: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an Expression Language Statement ('Expression Language Injection')

nodes.Description:
CWE-78: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
The product constructs all or part of an OS command using externally-influenced input from an upstream component, but it does not neutralize or incorrectly neutralizes special elements that could modify the intended OS command when it is sent to a downstream component.
nodes.label: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')

nodes.Description:
CWE-77: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection')
The product constructs all or part of a command using externally-influenced input from an upstream component, but it does not neutralize or incorrectly neutralizes special elements that could modify the intended command when it is sent to a downstream component.
nodes.label: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection')
